cards.name: Wyman Manderly
cards.text: Action: Sacrifice a character. Reaction: After 1 or more characters you control are sacrificed or killed, stand Wyman Manderly and draw 1 card. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: Honor-Bound
cards.text:
During [military] challenges, attached character gets +2 STR.
Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender in [intrigue] challenges.

cards.name: The Queen of Thorns
cards.text: Shadow (4). Stealth. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Queen of Thorns is participating, choose a card you control in shadows and put it into play.

cards.name: Oldtown Undercity
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand, place 1 on the bottom of your deck, and place the other on top of your deck. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Cunning Steward
cards.text:
Shadow (3).
While you are the defending player, Cunning Steward gains a [military] and a [power] icon.

cards.name: The Wall
cards.text: Each character you control gains the [thenightswatch] affiliation and loses all other faction affiliations. Action: Kneel The Wall to choose an opponent. Put an eligible character of that player’s choice from his or her discard pile into play under your control.

cards.name: Ser Justin Massey
cards.text: While you control a King character, Ser Justin Massey gains renown. Reaction: After a [baratheon] character gains power, stand it. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: March on Winterfell
cards.text: Play only during a challenge you initiated. Action: End the challenge with no winner or loser. You may initiate an additional [power] challenge this phase.

cards.name: Penny
cards.text:
Shadow (1).
While you control more cards in shadows than each opponent, Penny gains an [intrigue] icon and stealth.

cards.name: Bowels of Casterly Rock
cards.text: Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, either: gain 2 gold, or draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Hagen's Daughter
cards.text: Shadow (2). Interrupt: When Hagen’s Daughter would be killed, save her and return her to shadows.

cards.name: "Steel Rain"
cards.text: Shadow (2). Action: Sacrifice any number of [greyjoy] locations. For each location sacrificed, search your deck for a different [greyjoy] location with equal or lower printed cost and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Hizdahr zo Loraq
cards.text: Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to reduce the cost of the next card you marshal, ambush, or bring out of shadows this phase by 3. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Meereen
cards.text: Action: Kneel Meereen to place each card in your hand facedown under Meereen and draw 3 cards. At the end of the phase, or if Meereen leaves play, discard your hand and return each card you placed under Meereen to your hand.

cards.name: Maiden of Poisons
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Maiden of Poisons is participating, sacrifice it to choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons and return it to its owner’s hand.

cards.name: Serve. Obey. Protect.
cards.text: Play only if you have lost a challenge as the defending player this phase. Reaction: After an opponent initiates a challenge against you, return a [martell] character to your hand to put a different [martell] character with printed cost 5 or lower into play from your hand.

cards.name: Tycho Nestoris
cards.text: You cannot win the game. Action: Pay 6 gold to treat Tycho Nestoris’s printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits) until the end of the phase. +3 Income.

cards.name: City Gates
cards.text: Limited. Action: Pay 1 gold and discard City Gates from your hand to draw 1 card. +1 Income.

cards.name: Trading With Qohor
cards.text: While you control no attachments, increase the gold value on each opponent’s revealed plot card by 1. Reaction: After claim is applied for a challenge you won, sacrifice an attachment to search your deck for a different attachment with equal or lower printed cost and put it into play.

cards.name: The Bloody Flux
cards.text: Characters cannot be saved.
